TASK: Clear browsing history
DOMAIN: browser

STEPS:
1. Open Google Chrome browser
   REASONING: Need to launch the browser application to access browsing history settings
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.5, y=0.98)

2. Wait for Windows Start menu to appear
   REASONING: Allow time for the Start menu to fully render before typing
   ACTION: WAIT(0.5)

3. Type "Chrome" to search for the browser
   REASONING: Quickly locate Google Chrome in the Start menu search
   ACTION: TYPE("Chrome")

4. Wait for search results to populate
   REASONING: Allow time for search results to display
   ACTION: WAIT(0.5)

5. Click on Google Chrome from search results
   REASONING: Launch the browser application
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.5, y=0.3)

6. Wait for Chrome to fully load
   REASONING: Ensure the browser window is completely loaded before proceeding
   ACTION: WAIT(2.0)

7. Open Chrome menu using keyboard shortcut
   REASONING: Access the browser settings menu efficiently to navigate to history options
   ACTION: HOTKEY("ctrl", "h")

8. Wait for History panel to open
   REASONING: Allow time for the history sidebar or tab to appear
   ACTION: WAIT(1.0)

9. Click on "Clear browsing data" button
   REASONING: Access the dialog where browsing data can be deleted
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.2, y=0.25)

10. Wait for Clear browsing data dialog to appear
    REASONING: Allow the settings dialog to fully render with all options
    ACTION: WAIT(1.0)

11. Ensure "Browsing history" checkbox is selected
    REASONING: Confirm that browsing history will be included in the data to be cleared
    ACTION: CLICK(x=0.15, y=0.35)

12. Select time range from dropdown
    REASONING: Choose the appropriate time period for clearing history (default is often "Last hour" but user may want "All time")
    ACTION: CLICK(x=0.5, y=0.25)

13. Wait for dropdown menu to expand
    REASONING: Allow time for time range options to display
    ACTION: WAIT(0.5)

14. Select "All time" option
    REASONING: Clear all browsing history from the beginning (most common use case for this task)
    ACTION: CLICK(x=0.5, y=0.45)

15. Click "Clear data" button to confirm
    REASONING: Execute the clearing of browsing history
    ACTION: CLICK(x=0.7, y=0.8)

16. Wait for data clearing process to complete
    REASONING: Allow Chrome to process and clear the browsing history
    ACTION: WAIT(2.0)

17. Task completed successfully
    REASONING: Browsing history has been cleared from the browser
    ACTION: DONE()

EXPECTED_OUTCOME: All browsing history for the selected time range (All time) should be permanently deleted from Google Chrome. The history page should now show no entries, and previously visited sites will no longer appear in the browser's history. A confirmation message may briefly appear indicating the data has been cleared.
